title: Benoit Delbecq, Francois Houle - Because She Hoped (2011)
description: Benoît Delbecq / François Houle Because She Hoped 2011 - Songlines Recordings: SGL 1592-2 http://www.songlines.com/release/because-she-hoped/ * Benoît Delbecq: piano * François Houle: clarinet http://www.delbecq.net/ http://www.francoishoule.ca/ Recorded by Etienne Bultingaire at Studio John Cage, La Muse en Circuit, in Alfortville, France, on January 18, 2011. Reviews ~~~~~~~ By Stef http://www.freejazzblog.org/2011/11/duets-with-delbecq.html On the first recording, Delbecq plays with Canadian clarinettist François Houle, with whom he's been performing and recording since 1995, and that can be heard on these ten pieces, all composed, with tunes by Ellington ("The Mystery Song") and Steve Lacy ("Clichés"), but mostly by Delbecq and Houle. Both artists create silk-like music, soft to the touch, natural and warm and shiny, with an ease of interaction and joy of interplay that is fantastic to listen to. Delbecq can make his piano play odd-rhythmed percussive parts by plucking the strings while playing fluent unision lines with his other hand, as on "Ando", or "Nancali", incredibly captivating, and keeping a safe distance from the often bland sweetness of romantic piano music. Both musicians have this light touch to their instrument, full of sensitivity and deep emotion, clever in the musical inventiveness and effortless, as if every note bubbles up from a common well, forming nice patterns when rising to the surface. Compare it to silk, to a warm breeze, to champagne, ... Incredibly beautiful music. -- By Glenn Astarita http://www.allaboutjazz.com/because-she-hoped-benoit-delbecq-songlines-recordings-review-by-glenn-astarita.php By Perry Tannenbaum http://jazztimes.com/articles/30084-because-she-hoped-beno-t-delbecq-fran-ois-houle By Ken Waxman http://www.thewholenote.com/index.php/booksrecords2/jazzaimprovised/16404-because-she-hoped-benoit-delbecq-francois-houle By Ben Ratliff http://www.nytimes.com/2011/12/27/arts/music/new-music-from-webbie-and-charlotte-gainsbourg.html Da Ettore Garzia (it) Por Edson Santos (pt-br) http://www.sojazz.org.br/2013/02/benoit-delbecqfrancois-houle-because.html Par Pierre de Chocqueuse (fr) http://www.blogdechoc.fr/article-b-delbecq-f-houle-because-she-hoped-songlines-abeille-89674163.html Par Jean-Marc Gelin (fr) http://www.lesdnj.com/article-benoit-delbecq-francois-houle-because-she-hopped-91361964.html Par Julien Gros-Burdet (fr) http://www.citizenjazz.com/Benoit-Delbecq-Francois-Houle,3466884.html
